entry.def: Philosophic means the same as philosophical .

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to philosophy or philosophers;
2. characteristic of or imbued with the attitude of a philosopher or based on philosophy;

sentences.sentence: "that breadth of outlook that distinguishes the philosophic mind"

means.word_mean: 3. characterized by the attitude of a philosopher; meeting trouble with level-headed detachment;
